name: Busy Day Chicken
author: Lori Reinagel
instructions: Grease 9 x 12 x 2 inch pan on bottom and sides. Sprinkle rice over bottom. Warm soup with milk in microwave for 2 minutes. Stir. Pour over rice and arrange chicken pieces over this. Sprinkle with onion soup mix. Cover and bake at 350Â° for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
